org.openhab.core.automation.template

Interface RuleTemplateProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Provider<RuleTemplate>, TemplateProvider<RuleTemplate>

    @NonNullByDefault
public interface RuleTemplateProvider
extends TemplateProvider<RuleTemplate>
    This interface provides basic functionality for managing RuleTemplates. It can be used for
    • Get the existing RuleTemplates with the Provider.getAll(), TemplateProvider.getTemplates(Locale) and TemplateProvider.getTemplate(String, Locale) methods.
    Listers that are listening for adding removing or updating can be added with the Provider.addProviderChangeListener(ProviderChangeListener) and removed with the Provider.removeProviderChangeListener(ProviderChangeListener) methods.
    Author:
    Ana Dimova - Initial contribution

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.openhab.core.automation.template.TemplateProvider

        getTemplate, getTemplates

      • Methods inherited from interface org.eclipse.smarthome.core.common.registry.Provider

        addProviderChangeListener, getAll, removeProviderChangeListener
